title: naradha gana
sahitya:
nArada gAna vishArada shArada nIradAbha dEha mAm pAhi

anupallavi

 bhUri krpA rasa pUrNa sura nikara pUjita varamuni pungava shubhakara

caraNam 1

 tulasI tAmasa mAncita kandhara tumburu hitavara vINAdhrta 
kara jalajAsanAtmaja jaTAdharAkhila jagatrakSaka jAtamrta rahita
 
caraNam 2

 lOkOpakAra krtAvatAra lOkatraya sanchArAghadUra 
pAkavairinuta bhadra caritra padmanAbha pada bhaktAgrEsara
 
caraNam 3

 parama bhAgavata kulAlankrta prahlAda mukha bhaktAnugraha 
parama tapO mahimAdbhuta vigraha vara nArAyaNa smaraNa dhuriNa
 
caraNam 4

 shrI rAmacandrapura ramya nikEtana rAmadAsa krta durita nivAraNa 
rAma bhaktAgrEsara shrI vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata pUjita caraNa
